bug.author: jovany-wang
bug.summary: Some flake cases failed on master
bug.description:
Some cases in auto scaling test some times failed on current master. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ericl>@ericl</denchmark-link> Could you take a look? AutoscalingTest.testSetupCommandsWithNoNodeCaching AutoscalingTest.testSetupCommandsWithStoppedNodeCaching <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.com/ray-project/ray/jobs/269096956>https://travis-ci.com/ray-project/ray/jobs/269096956</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.com/ray-project/ray/jobs/269160225>https://travis-ci.com/ray-project/ray/jobs/269160225</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ericl>@ericl</denchmark-link> , could you take a look at those test, I found those test failed a lot in my PR's ci.
